name: Immolate
description:
Controls!   Only gameplay button is the spacebar or left click, the number keys 1, 2, and 3 will adjust the window size (for downloadable   file, suggested method of play as I had many issues with   the older gamemaker export to html, will not have time to sort any issues currently)

A simple endless runner, made with less than even 12 hours to  put into it and lot of problems and setbacks, done    for the GMTK Game Jam. This is really one of my first completed "real" games having  planned and finished its development in some odd 8ish hours. One button to play with the Space Bar, collect flame , avoid explodey robots and barrels. Your health is also connect to your energy to fight and flee, so  careful about using your attack or double jump as it drains the precious flame keeping you alive!

Score guide

Destroy barrel 20 points

Destroy robot 50 points

Collect flame 200 points

You will gain additional speed and score multiplier while on low health, try to get the highest scores possible!

Background and music    assets:   Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)

Robert enemy:  Penusbmic

Assorted other assets from CraftPix: Cyberpunk character, Industrial Zone Tileset
